channel.title: A few questions... Barrows, Barrow effects, ::starter, prayer, castlewars
channel.description:
Well I need a few questions answered:
How do I add a barrows minigame, or spawn monsters so that they are PERM in the places i need... How do I make guthans, karils, ahrims, veracs, and torags effects work... (dharoks already does) How do I make a ::starter command, and make it work... How do I make Prayer work... (mainly protect from combats) How would I go about making a castlewars minigame... (coding it myself) The doors dont open, that needs fixed, and what would I do for flag, to make it equippable, and make it remove weapon, and make it stand up in stand...
Also, if you want to give me codes for any of the above PLEASE POST THEM! And if you can, tell me WHERE to post the codes in my client.java
Thanks, HBG

item.title: A few questions... Barrows, Barrow effects, ::starter, prayer, castlewars
item.dc:creator: @burnout burnout
item.description:
@burnout wrote:

if using dodian source you can add && (premium) to the end of what your tryin to make prem area/wep or add it below like mine

heres an example from my barrows/ this makes varrock sewer barrows

if (objectID == 881) { if (premium) { teleportToX = 3552; teleportToY = 9693; heightLevel -= -1; sendMessage("you climb down the hole"); } else { sendMessage("You need to have a members account to access this area"); } }

Read full topic
item.source: A few questions... Barrows, Barrow effects, ::starter, prayer, castlewars
